sentences.en: Give no artificial teat or pacifier to your breastfeeding baby.
sentences.cn: 请勿给予正接受母乳哺饲之婴儿使用奶咀或其他同类物品.

sentences.en: Never use a bottle nipple for pacifier.
sentences.cn: 千万不要用奶瓶的奶头代替橡皮奶头.

sentences.en: Temperatures measured orally, by electronic pacifier, or by ear canal are also accurate if done properly.
sentences.cn: 从耳道测得的体温, 或者通过奶嘴式电子体温计从口腔测得的体温, 只要测量方式正确的话,也是准确的.

sentences.en: The baby reached for the pacifier.
sentences.cn: 这个小婴儿伸手去够橡皮奶嘴.

sentences.en: The baby was biting at the pacifier.
sentences.cn: 那个婴儿正朝着奶嘴咬去.

sentences.en: The baby was sucking on a pacifier.
sentences.cn: 那个婴儿正在吸橡皮奶嘴.

sentences.en: The main products pacifier pacify, pacifiers and other animals.
sentences.cn: 主要产品为安抚奶嘴, 动物奶嘴等.

sentences.en: The telly is a universal pacifier.
sentences.cn: 电视是通用的使人安静的工具.

sentences.en: Tom: I don't know. Maybe she wants her pacifier?
sentences.cn: 汤姆: 我不知道. 可能她想要她的奶嘴?

sentences.en: Yeah. And while I was leaning on the windowsill, my pacifier fell out of my mouth.
sentences.cn: 是的. 当我靠着窗沿的时候, 我的奶嘴掉了出去.

words.tran_cn: 调解人；抚慰者；橡皮奶头

trans.tran_cn: <美>橡皮奶头，安抚奶嘴，镇静剂，镇静物
